abstract_ssm: The Abu Dhabi Film Festival Collection includes DVD copies of many films screened over the course of the festival's 2007-2014 run and ephemera related to the festival.  The films represent the different sections of each festival as well as the work of local and international filmmakers.
corpname_ssm: NYU Abu Dhabi, Archives and Special Collections
